SectionBody.Text: The provisions of this act shall not apply to the following retail sales by a refiner:

Subsection.Text: A bona fide clearance sale for the purpose of discontinuing trade in such motor fuel.
A sale of the refiner’s motor fuel by a fiduciary or other officer under the order or direction of any court.

Sales made during a grand opening to introduce a new or remodeled business not to exceed 3 days, which grand opening shall be held within 60 days from the date the new or remodeled business begins operations.
